mapper.select: SELECT DIARY_ID, DIARY_MEM_EMAIL, DIARY_PLAN_ID, DIARY_TITLE, DIARY_CONTENT, DIARY_DATE, DIARY_OPEN, DIARY_VIEWS, DIARY_THEME FROM DIARY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO diary ( DIARY_ID, DIARY_MEM_EMAIL, DIARY_PLAN_ID, DIARY_TITLE, DIARY_CONTENT, DIARY_DATE, DIARY_OPEN, DIARY_VIEWS, DIARY_THEME) VALUES (diary_seq.NEXTVAL, #{diaryMemEmail}, #{diaryPlanId}, #{diaryTitle}, #{diaryContent}, #{diaryDate}, #{diaryOpen}, #{diaryViews}, #{diaryTheme})
mapper.update: UPDATE diary SET DIARY_TITLE = #{diaryTitle}, DIARY_CONTENT = #{diaryContent}, DIARY_DATE = #{diaryDate}, DIARY_OPEN = #{diaryOpen}, DIARY_THEME = #{diaryTheme} WHERE DIARY_ID = #{diaryId};
